description:
In Master the Google Apps Admin Console, you will learn what every Google Apps administrator must know to effectively manage an educational domain.

The session begins with the top ten crucial configuration tips, then provides best practices for organizational units, user management and service-level settings. You will explore Gmail's advanced options for staff and student accounts. Configure Google Groups and uncover the important fundamental change they can make on your domain. Explore the latest security enhancements and in-depth reporting.

The class is not textbook learning! It's written from the real world perspective from technicians and trainers who manage thousands of Google Apps for Education users every day.

This session is an excellent additional study guide for becoming certified as a Google Apps administrator.
title: Master The Google Apps Admin Console
